settingsNewButtonPopover.primary: App Settings are now at the bottom-right corner
settingsNewButtonPopover.secondary: Click on the ‚öôÔ∏è button to open them.

newUpdateAvailable: A new version of LM Studio is available! üéâ
newBetaUpdateAvailable: A new beta version of LM Studio is available! üõ†Ô∏èüéâ
updateDownloaded: The app needs to be restarted to apply the update
toolUseToastTitle: New in Beta: Tool Use and Function Calls API
toolUseToastDescription: Drop-in replacement for OpenAI Tool Use with select models such as Llama 3.1/3.2, Mistral, and Qwen.
toolUseToastButtonText: Head to the developer page to try it out
failedToUpdate: App update failed. Please double-check your internet connection or try again later.
uptodate: You are all up to date! The current version is {{version}}
showModelFileNames: My Models: always show full model file name
selectComplexityLevelPlaceholder: Choose a default UI complexity level
chat/alwaysShowPromptTemplate: Always show prompt template in Chat sidebar
chat/doubleClickMessageToEdit: Double click on a chat message to edit
chat/aiNaming/mode/value/auto/subTitle: Decides whether to create names based on generation speed
chat/aiNaming/mode/value/always/subTitle: Create AI-generated chat names regardless of generation speed
chat/aiNaming/emoji: Use emojis in AI-generated chat names
chat/keyboardShortcuts/regenerate: to regenerate the last message in chat
onboarding/resetHintTooltip: Click to reenable this onboarding hint
onboarding/noneDismissed: No dismissed hints, currently all onboarding helper hints will appear until next dismissed
showPromptSuggestionsLabel: Show prompt suggestions when creating a new chat
unloadPreviousModelLabel: When selecting a model to load, first unload any currently loaded ones
showDebugInfoBlocksInChatLabel: Show debug info blocks in chat
autoLoadBundledLLMLabel: Auto load a bundled LLM model on start
backendDownloadChannel.label: LM Studio Extension Packs Download Channel
backendDownloadChannel.hint: Choose the channel from which to download LM Studio extension packs. "{{stableName}}" is the recommended channel for most users.
appUpdateChannel.label: Updates Channel
appUpdateChannel.hint: Choose the channel from which to receive LM Studio app updates. "{{stableName}}" is the recommended channel for most users.
modelLoadingGuardrails.label: Model loading guardrails
modelLoadingGuardrails.description: Loading models beyond system resource limits may cause system instability or freezing. Guardrails prevent accidental overloading. Adjust these limits here if necessary, but be aware that loading models near the system's limit may reduce stability.
modelLoadingGuardrails.value.custom/subT: Set your own limit for maximum model size that can be loaded
modelLoadingGuardrails.custom.label: Memory Limit:
modelLoadingGuardrails.custom.descriptio: Set a custom memory limit for model loading. Models will not load if loading them would exceed this limit.
modelLoadingGuardrails.alwaysAllowLoadAn: (Not recommended) Always allow 'Load Anyway' without holding Alt/Option
experimentalLoadPresets: Enable model load configuration support in presets
experimentalLoadPresets.description: Whether to allow presets to include model load configurations. This feature is experimental and we welcome feedback.
unloadPreviousJITModelOnLoad: JIT models auto-evict: ensure at most 1 model is loaded via JIT at any given time (unloads previous model)
autoDeleteExtensionPacks: Auto-delete least recently used Runtime Extension Packs
useHFProxy.label: Use LM Studio's Hugging Face Proxy
useHFProxy.hint: Use LM Studio's Hugging Face Proxy to search and download models. This can help users who have trouble accessing Hugging Face directly.
separateReasoningContentInResponses: When applicable, separate `reasoning_content` and `content` in API responses
separateReasoningContentInResponses/hint: This setting will only work for 'reasoning' models such as DeepSeek R1, its distilled variants, and other models that produce CoT in `<think>` and `</think>` tags.
promptWhenCommittingUnsavedChangesWithNe: Presets: Show confirmation dialog when committing new fields to the preset
This is useful if you want to prevent accidentally adding new fields to presets
enableLocalService.subtitle: Use LM Studio's LLM server without having to keep the LM Studio application open
enableLocalService.description: When enabled, the LM Studio Local LLM Service will be launched on startup. Closing LM Studio will also leave the Local LLM Service running in the system tray.
expandConfigsOnClick: Expand configs on click rather than hover

migrateChats.label: Migrate pre-0.3.0 Chats

hint.primary: We revamped the internal data structure for v0.3.0+ chats to support features like multi-version chat messages. To make older chats appear in the app they need to be migrated to the new format.
hint.details: The migration process will NOT delete your old chats, but rather make a copy of them in the new format.
hint.footer: You can still access your old chats through older versions of LM Studio. Currently, images will not be migrated automatically.

hasBetterHint.primary: We have improved the chat migrator since you have migrated your old chats. Would you like to run it again?
hasBetterHint.details: The migration process will create a new folder to contain the newly migrated chats. Your old chats will remain untouched.
hasBetterHint.footer: You can still access your old chats through older versions of LM Studio. Currently, images will not be migrated automatically.

migrateChats.footerCardText: Chats from previous versions of LM Studio need to be migrated in order for them to be used in this version.
migrateChats.hasBetterFooterCardText: We have improved the chat migrator since you have migrated your old chats. You can rerun the migration process. (We will create a new folder to contain the newly migrated chats.)
migrateChats.dismissConfirmDescription: You can always handle chat migration in Settings

neverAsk.label: Never ask for confirmations before running a tool (NOT RECOMMENDED)
neverAsk.hint: Disable the confirmations before running a tool. This is not recommend.
neverAsk.warnDescription: Disabling tool call confirmations is dangerous. If any of your plugins contributed a tool that has the potential to perform destructive actions (such as running a command, deleting files, overwriting files, uploading files, etc), the model will be able to do so without any confirmation. You can always disable confirmations on a per-tool or even per-plugin basis. Enabling this option is NOT recommended. Please be careful.

defaultContextLength.label: Default Context Length
defaultContextLength.maxSubtitle: Use the maximum context length supported by each model.
defaultContextLength.customSubtitle: Set the default context length for loading new models. If the model's supported maximum context length is lower, that value will be used.
defaultContextLength.invalidRangeError: Invalid context length value. Should be in the range of 1 and 2^30. Using {{value}}
defaultContextLength.largeContextWarning: The higher the context length, the more memory the model will take. If you are unsure, don't change the default

jitTTL.subtitle: JIT-loaded models will be automatically unloaded after being idle for the specified duration.
